span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: latobold; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
span.span:
Click here to locate helpful documents from USC Social Workers: COVID-19 Documents
Reminder: Distance Learning continues through May 4. Daycare for children of "essential personnel" to continue. Meals requested by families available for pick-up at Fire Stations (11-11:30). Staff planning days on May 1 and 4---Regular school to resume May 5.
PLEASE READ: USC Distance Learning Plan & Distance Learning Letters to Families from Principals

p.style: margin-bottom: 6px; letter-spacing: normal; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); text-align: center;

br.span: Click the links below to read important notices from
USC's Elementary and High School Principals

a.title: USC High School Letter to Families (3-20-20)

br.a: USC HIGH SCHOOL LETTER TO FAMILIES (3-20-20)

br.span: Your teachers miss seeing you every day, so they--along with other staff members--have created a video to show what they have been doing this week.

p.style: margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; display: inline; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);
p.span: The kitchen staff might be preparing meals a little differently, the bus drivers are transporting sack lunches instead of students, but your teachers remain devoted to your education. Along with practicing new skills, they are preparing lessons they are anxious to share with you. Until we are together again, have fun, practice your Rebel Rights of Responsibility, Respect, and Safety--and, most important now, Stay Healthy!

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: latobold; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: latobold; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

br.span: IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT: COVID-19 MEALS REQUESTED BY FAMILIES will be distributed in Bricelyn, Easton, Freeborn, Kiester, Walters, and Wells. Location: Fire Halls Time: Between 11-11:30am

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: latobold; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
letter-spacing: 0.07px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Ubuntu, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; color: rgb(20, 23, 26);

strong.span: op off COVID-19 meals for families requesting them. Do you know a family whose students might benefit from this program? Tell them to call the school! (Not all might have seen the survey posted. Thanks for helping get the word out!)

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: latobold; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

span.span: Click below to read the SUNDAY, MARCH 15, announcement: MARCH 15TH COVID-19 LETTER TO USC FAMILIES COVID 19 Update... 3_15_20.pd
